law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"General Selection Board" means the General Professional Services Selection Board.

"Person" includes, unless the context requires otherwise:
the State;
a county, municipal corporation, or other political subdivision; and
any unit of the State government or a political subdivision.
"Selection Board" means the General Selection Board or the Transportation Selection Board.
"Transportation Selection Board" means the Transportation Professional Services Selection Board.
